programmes.show_description: Get your fix of all the best new releases in one handy playlist.
Buck Meek, formerly of Big Thief, breaks down his new record, while Peaches is back and on fine form, and electronic master Apparat details his new, eclectic album.
6 Music takes you through the early hours playing back to back music.
6 Music goes back to the 90s!
6 Music goes back to the 00s!
Chris Hawkins takes you through 30 minutes of remixed, re-versioned and re-imagined tracks. Featuring Tame Impala, Nubiyan Twist, Declan McKenna and more .
New music and the biggest Friday bangers with Amy Lamé. Plus a fifth and final pick from this week's 5 before 6 DJ.
Nick welcomes one of his all-time favourite artists, Labi Siffre, to the show to talk about his career and brand new music.
Jamz brings a great selection of tunes to kick-start your weekend.
Craig spins some joyous tunes to get your weekend started, before opening up the Trunk of Funk!
It's Friday, so Huw is out to prove that any song sounds better when it's played on 6 Music by Huw Stephens - so let us know what you want to hear.

programmes.show_name: The People's Party with Femi Koleoso
programmes.show_description: The British soul and R&B singer Shaun Escoffery, known for his first major single Space Rider, reveals the soulful tracks that pair with his different Friday nights.
Nathan brings the Friday night indie club vibes with music from Wet Leg and White Denim!
Clothing and fashion-themed indie from Vaccines, Pulp, Circa Waves, PJ Harvey and more!

programmes.show_name: The 6 Mix with Mary Anne Hobbs
programmes.show_description: Producer and DJ Stenny takes over the 6 Mix off the back of his new release Sharp Fragments on the Ilian tape imprint.
(Some of) the best tracks to have soundtracked dance floors over the last 25 years!
6 Music takes you to the dark side with a playlist of the finest goth, electronic and dark pop music, with tracks from Peter Murphy, The Walker Brothers, Yugen Blakrok and PVA.

programmes.show_name: Indie Forever Disco with Beth Ditto
programmes.show_description: Bringing the club vibes to you - wherever you are, whenever you want. Upbeat music to transport you to the dance floor from M83, Radio 4 and Scissor Sisters.
Carefully crafted two hour ambient mix of blissful sounds to transport you into a deep focus.
Ease into your Saturday with AFRODEUTSCHE - the ultimate soft-launch for your weekend. Two hours of deep-listening tracks designed to ground you before the weekend truly begins.
Mark and Stuart present a feast of great music, and comedian Mike Wozniak shares his 'First, Last and Everything' and chats about his latest tour.
Deb Grant sets you up for the weekend with a wild mix of amazing music genres and vibes. Including ace sounds from Cymande, The Revolutionaries, Metallica, Dead Prez and Nick Drake.
Jamz gets your weekend party started with an uplifting array of alternative RnB, broken beat, global club sounds and leftfield electronica.
Joining the musical dots, soul, hip-hop, house, Afro, Latin, electronica, jazz and beyond.

programmes.show_name: The Craig Charles Funk and Soul Show
programmes.show_description: Putting down the Trunk of Funk is Diogo Strausz, a seriously talented Brazilian producer whose latest record nods to the trailblazing 80s Brazilian sound.
Don's Saturday night selections cross time, space and genre. This weekend, he's got new numbers by Reggae Roast, Daniel Avery, Lexa Gates, Invisible System and Kumail.
It's all about the breaks and late-night rollers as SHERELLE soundtracks your Saturday evening...
